All Classes

Class Description
AddTransactionToCategory
Table used to add Transactions to a Category
AddTransactionToCategoryModel
Table model for adding transactions to categories
Category
Storage object for the information of each category
CategoryFrame
Frame used for adding or editing categories
CategoryMenu
Menu for displaying the Category List
CategoryTable
Creates a panel containing a table of all Categories in the TransactionLog
CategoryTableFrame
Displays a list of Categories for adding, removing, or editing Categories.
DatePicker
A pop-up menu for selecting dates
ExpensesPanel
Constructs the Expenses panel of the GUI
FileMenu
The File Menu of the MenuBar.
GUIManager  
GUIUserInfoTray
Setups the information displayed at the top of the overall GUI
Login
Creates and opens the Login frame for the user to login to BearBudget
Main
Initializes the software
OverviewPanel  
Report
Each object stores the data for a single report generated by the Reporter object
Reporter
Generates and stores reports based on the Transactions in the TransactionLog
SaveFrame
The frame that allows the user to set their current savings and the date of which they had those savings in the TransactionLog
Transaction
Each transaction object represents the information for a single unique transaction
TransactionFrame
Frame displaying the info for a single Transaction
TransactionLog
The TransactionLog object stores the data for all Transactions and Categories
TransactionTable
Creates the panel that contains a table of the Transactions in the TransactionLog
TransactionTableModel
Table model for the Transaction display table
Types
Enumeration of the two different Transaction types, Income and Expense.
User
Each user object contains the username and password for the user which are used to generate the filename for the users saved data
